#A summary of how to add people to your BibApp installation.

= Summary =

This is a summary of how to add people to your BibApp installation. 

We find it helps to start with:

- a list of researchers (on a department or center website for example)
- access to images of faculty members
- the groups that each faculty member belongs to and to have these groups already entered into BibApp.
